attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that Old Age Pensioners be given equitable treatment; that no parts of their income in retirement are treated unfairly; that those parts of their pensions that are earnings related (SERPS) raise in line with inflation in the same way as the basic state pension

rejection.details: Your petition is currently too general. A petition needs to request one clear action bty the government. Each of the points you make could form a petition in its own right. Please resubmit accordingly.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
